G837.def: to increase in the extent of or in the instances of an activity or state

G4129.def: to increase greatly in number or extent

G1161.def: a marker of an additive relation, but with the possible implication of some contrast

G921.def: an additional name of a certain Joseph, a Levite from Cyprus who was an associate of Paul

G4569.def: an alternative form of {L:Σαούλ<SDBG:Σαούλ:000000>}, {D:93.327}, the Hebrew name of the apostle Paul

G4137.def: (derivative of {L:πλήρης<SDBG:πλήρης:000000>}[a] ‘full,’ {D:59.35}) to cause something to become full

G3588.def: a reference to an entity, event, or state, clearly identified by the linguistic or non-linguistic context of the utterance{N:001}

G1248.def: to render assistance or help by performing certain duties, often of a humble or menial nature

G5290.def: to move back to a point from which one has previously departed

G4838.def: to take along with, with emphasis upon accompaniment

G1941.def: to use an attribution in speaking of a person

G3138.def: a companion of Paul who was also called John
